ModMetaData.name: Hediff Resource Framework
ModMetaData.author: FraudulentEconomics, Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
Hediff Resource Framework adds a variety of functionality and features to hediffs using a new custom hediff class, HediffResourceDef. This framework does nothing by itself, but when combined with a mod that is configured to use its features, it is capable of a number of new features and mechanics. You can find a wiki highlighting all of the added mechanics and fields here:
https://github.com/fraudulenteconomics/HediffResourceFramework/wiki
